title: ESA Re evaluation 2025 CSE
content: It shows as verified today what does it mean the subject I put for re evaluation are checked or it is just a confirmation for payment verification

comments.body:
Verified there means the payment which you have done has been verified. 

Once they correct your paper after re-eval, it will be mentioned if any grade change has occured or not
On what date did you apply for revaluation? My status is still 'paid'
